content: @KrisHiles It’s next to impossible to mess up as long as you’re even in the ballpark proportion-wise. Just good ol’ comfort food and a great quick dish for gatherings. I really want to throw in some Italian sausage or something sometime to make it a one-pot meal.

Hunger Action Month - Food Shouldn't Be An Impossible Choice.
